item.title: Report E-2024070096
item.description:
Report E-2024070096

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-08T18:15:44+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-25
  • City: KANSAS CITY
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R&L CARRIERS SHARED SERVICES, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On June 25, 2024, one (1) 325-gallon tote of UN2014 was damaged in a load shift and released approximately twenty-five gallons of product to the trailer interior and dock floor. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from Environmental Works (EW) to remediate the impacted site. EW personnel utilized a transfer kit to transfer the virgin product into one (1) 325-gallon tote. Crews deployed granular absorbents and worked them in using hand tools. EW personnel utilized absorbent wipes to remediate any residual product. All UN2014 impacted material was collected and containerized in one (1) 325-gallon tote and one (1) 55-gallon drum for disposal.

item.title: Report X-2024070147
item.description:
Report X-2024070147

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-05T18:14:58+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-25
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SUPERVISOR CALLED IN A LEAKER TO THE DMP. DMP DISPATCHED A RESPONDER WITH FULL PPE AND DECSION TREE TO THE SPILL. RESPONDER ARRIVED ON SCENE AND FOUND THE LEAEKR. RESPONDER CONSULTED THE DECSION TREE ON HOW TO CLEAN UP THE SPILL. RESPONDER FOLLOWED THE DECSION TREE AND CLEANED UP THE SPILL. RESPONDER BROUGHT BACK THE LEAKER TO DMP FOR PROPER DISPOSAL.

item.title: Report X-2024070112
item.description:
Report X-2024070112

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-05T18:14:58+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-18
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: THE RESPONDER RESPONDED TO DOOR 274 FOR A LEAKING PACKAGE. NO MARKING ON THE BOX THAT WOULD SUGGEST IT HAD A LIMITED QUANTITY MATERIAL INSIDE. THE PACKAGE WAS CONTAINERIZED AND BROUGHT TO THE DMP AREA FOR FURTHER PROCESSING. HELP DESK CALLED. PACKAGE BEING HELD FOR INSPECTION.
